thread.title: Grey Gardens Goes on the Market for Nearly $20 Million
thread.title_full: Grey Gardens Goes on the Market for Nearly $20 Million - WSJ

author: Candace Taylor
title: Grey Gardens Goes on the Market for Nearly $20 Million
text:
Grey Gardens, the East Hampton home that inspired a documentary, an HBO movie and a Broadway musical, is going on the market for the first time in decades with an asking price of $19.995 million.

The seller is journalist Sally Quinn, who said she purchased the roughly 6,000-square-foot shingle-style home for $220,000 in 1979. She and her late husband Ben Bradlee, the longtime executive editor of the Washington Post, restored the then-crumbling house for an estimated $600,000 and used it for years as a summer home, Ms....
